GLOBAL.DESCRIPTION:
MyPads is an Etherpad plugin whose development has been crowdfounded in 2014 via an Ulule campaign. It handles :
  • users and their authentication;
  • groups of pads per user, unlimited, sharable;
  • attached pads, with choice between invite known users to use them, making them private with password or letting them public.

NOTIFICATION.ERROR_UNEXPECTED: An unexpected error has been raised. Please contact the administrator.

TAG.HELP: You can associate to this element as many tags as you wish

USER.USELOGINANDCOLORINPADS: Use login and color in pads?

INFO.LOGIN: The unique login you choose when you have subscribed
INFO.EMAIL: The email is required for password recovery
INFO.COLOR: The hexademical code for color you want to be used by default in pads
INFO.LANG: Your default browser configuration, depends on available language on MyPads
INFO.USELOGINANDCOLORINPADS: Use login and chosen color in pads by default ?
INFO.PASSWORD_CHECK: For verification : must be the same as password
INFO.PASSWORD_CURRENT: Security check : required for all profile changes
INFO.REMOVE_ACCOUNT: Remove definitively your account and all the groups and pads for which you are the unique administrator
INFO.REMOVE_ACCOUNT_SURE: You are on the verge of removing definitively your account and all the groups and pads for which you are the unique administrator. If you are really sure about what you are doing, please enter your current password and click OK

ERR.EMAIL: The email is required and should be valid
ERR.COLOR: The hexadecimal code must be like #000000
ERR.LOGOUT: Log out error : you were not authenticated.
ERR.PASSWORD_MISMATCH: The entered passwords do not match.

HELP.PROFILE:
Every change into your profile needs the current password field to be correctly filled. Please note that :

  • you can change everything by updating the appropriate field;
  • leaving password and password confirmation empty won't affect your current password;
  • you can't change your login at the moment but you will be able to do it later;
  • if you want to change your password, please enter the new one into the password field and confirm it with the password confirmation.

GROUP.HELP: Groups contain pads, you need at least to create one of them
GROUP.ADD_HELP:
Visibility

You have the choice between three levels of visibility. It will impact all linked pads :

  • restricted, default choice : access of the pads are limited to a list of invited users you have chosen;
  • private : in this mode, you have to enter a password and access to the pads will be checked against this password;
  • public : in this mode, all pads are public, users just need to have the URL address.

Readonly

If you check readonly, all attached pads will stay in their state, and can not be edited. Note that visibility still works in readonly mode.

Tags

You can attach tags to this element by clicking on the corresponding input field and selecting them one by one.

To create a new tag, fill it and type ENTER key or click on the 'Ok' button. Once the tag has been added, it will automatically be selected on this form.

You can remove a tag by clicking on the cross located on the right of it.
GROUP.VIEW_MANAGE: View and manage group and its pads
GROUP.VIEW_HELP:
The details of the group show you:

  • options defined when group has been created or updated;
  • list of pads created for this group;
  • and list of admins and users of the group.

From there, you can:

  • create new pads, edit them, remove or mark them;
  • share administration of your group with other users;
  • invite other users to view and edit pads of the group.
GROUP.SHARE_LINK: Please share this URL to your guests
GROUP.SHARE_PASSWORD: Please enter the password to be able to share

INVITE_USER.HELP:
Userlists

You can select one or more userlists. Each click will add all members of the selected userlist to invited users.

Invite users

This field accepts one login at a time. When ENTER is typed, or OK is clicked, the login is added to the list of invited users. A list of known users helps you to fill the login.

Users

This list contains all selected users. You can remove one by clicking the sign after each login.

Note

Please note that, for instance, registered users will be automatically added to your group. In short term, external users will receive a mail for creating an account.
INVITE_USER.INPUT_HELP: You can invite as many users as you want
INVITE_USER.SUCCESS: User invitation has been successfully achieved

ADMIN_SHARE.SUCCESS: Administration sharing has been successfully achieved

TAGS.HELP: You can filter by one or more tags. Click again to deactivate if wanted

PAD.TITLE: Title
PAD.PUBLIC_DENIED: Public access : you are not allowed to see this data.
PAD.ADD_PROMPT: Enter the name of the new pad
PAD.EDIT_PROMPT: Enter the new name of the pad
PAD.MOVE: Move all pads to another group
PAD.MOVE_HELP:
Please select the wanted group for your migration. Only groups of which you are admin are listed.

Once chosen, click the submit button and wait for a moment.
PAD.VIEW_HELP:
Here is the main interface to the current pad.

If the group or the pad is private, you need to enter the password to be able to access it.

If you want to go back to the group, you can click on the group name.

INFO.NAME: Name of the group
INFO.VISIBILITY: Required, restricted by default to invited users or admins
INFO.READONLY: If checked, linked pads will be in readonly mode
INFO.REMOVE_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this group ?

INFO.RESIGN_SUCCESS: You have left the group successfully
INFO.PAD_REMOVE_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this pad ?
INFO.PAD_MOVE: Select the wanted group for your migration
INFO.PAD_MOVE_NOGROUP: Sorry but no other group is available. You should create one before.
INFO.PAD_MOVE_SUCCESS: All pads have been successfully moved

ERR.NAME: The name of the group is required

BOOKMARK.TITLE: My Bookmarks
BOOKMARK.HELP: Bookmark page offers you the ability to see all your bookmarked elements from MyPads. You can remove them from bookmarks if you want to.

USERLIST.HELP:
Here you can find all your userlists, ordered by creation date. Summary information is available with the name of each userlist and the number of users linked.

Through action icons, located on top right of each userlist, you can edit or remove lists. Details are available in the form view, via edit action.
USERLIST.FORM_HELP:
Name

You must give a name to the userlist, in order to be able to identify it.

Users

You can add as many users as you want. To do it, please enter the login and click on the 'OK' button. Note that already known users can be selected from the input.

To remove users, click on the cross located at the right of each login.

FIELD.NAME: Name
FIELD.USERS_HELP: Add as many users as you want

INFO.NAME: Name of the userlist
INFO.REMOVE_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this userlist?
INFO.USER_INVITE: By selecting a userlist, you will invite all its users at the same time

ERR.NAME: The name of the userlist is required

ADMIN.HELP_LOGIN: MyPads administration is tied to Etherpad administration. Please enter an authorized login and password, as fixed into Etherpad settings.json to be able to update MyPads settings.
ADMIN.HELP_SETTINGS:
Settings

Only Etherpad admins have access to this page. You can edit the global settings here and apply them. Changes will be effective directly.

Passwords

Be careful about password sizes: if you have existing accounts and raise minimum size or decrease maximum size, some user passwords may become unseizable.

Mail configuration

MyPads can verify the mails of subscribed users by sending them an email which will be used by them to confirm their address. Moreover, MyPads need email sending for password recovery.

Be cautious with SMTP configuration: bad parameters can lead to an Etherpad crash.

Please note that, unlike other parameters, SMTP settings are only applied after Etherpad reboot.
ADMIN.HELP_USERS:
This admin reserved page helps you to find users by entering their login. Once found, you will be able to edit or remove user.

For simplicity and performance reasons, we don't offer here a full listing of subscribed users.
ADMIN.HELP_USER_EDIT:
Here you can update all data associated to an existing user.

Please note that by default, leaving password empty means keeping the current password. If you want to change it, you have to fill password field and its confirmation.

INFO.LOGIN: The etherpad settings.json fixed admin login
INFO.TITLE: Global title displayed on your MyPads instance
INFO.LANGUAGE_DEFAULT: Default language for guest MyPads users
INFO.CHECKMAILS: Check user mail given at subscription
INFO.TOKEN_DURATION: The time, in minutes, generated tokens are valid until users confirm their subscription
INFO.SMTP_HOST: Domain name where the SMTP Server belongs to
INFO.SMTP_SECURE: Check it if you want to use an encrypted connexion between MyPads and your SMTP Server
INFO.SMTP_USER: Optional: if authentication to the SMTP server is required, username
INFO.SMTP_PASS: Optional: if authentication to the SMTP server is required, password
INFO.NOCHANGE: Configuration have not changed, so no update has been sent
INFO.USERS_SEARCH_LOGIN: Please enter a login to search around database users
INFO.USER_FOUND: User found, please see options inside the form
INFO.USER_REMOVE_SURE: You are on the verge of removing definitively this account and all the groups and pads on which the user is the unique administrator. If you are really sure about what you are doing, please click on the OK button.

ERR.TITLE: Title is mandatory
ERR.PASSWORD_SIZE: Min size can't be higher than max size. Please check your numbers.
ERR.LANGUAGE_DEFAULT: A default language must be selected
